works.description:
The mentioned site is taking portions of our work from various locations such as article hosting sites and blogs.  Once they take our content, they change a word or two and placing them on their site with no links back to our page.  The title of the article snip-it on their site is: How Your Business Can Benefit From Translation Services
The title of our article is: How Your Business Can Benefit From Translation Services  
When you review the first two sentences you can easily tell that they have stolen our content.
